title: The Lightning Gun
description: When a mad scientist and a terrorist join forces, the world is in danger.Emily’s parents are called in to investigate a new type of lightning, and though Emily spots clues the adults miss, no one will listen to her. At least until she meets Brandon.Brandon has problems of his own: total amnesia and a madwoman out to kill him! Fortunately, he has the skills and tools of a master spy, even if he can’t remember getting them.Emily and Brandon must work together to discover who controls the lightning. The damage is rising each time it strikes, and the next attack will kill thousands!
author: Jay Parks
